Player History
Injured on 5/9/2013 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Seattle on 7/20/2013 (Going to SEA: C Wyatt Mathisen, RF Travis Snider, LF Exicardo Cayonez. Going to PIT: 1B Kendry Morales)...
Injured on 5/1/2015 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/30/2015, off Randy Henry (BAL)...
Injured on 6/1/2015 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/2017, off Clay Buchholz (LAA)...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2017, hitting .325 with 6 HR, 74 RBI...
Injured on 9/19/2019 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $985,714 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,357,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/27/2021 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Washington on 6/10/2021...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 7/15/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2021, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Won World Series with Seattle in 2021...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,357,143 through salary arbitration...
9/11/2022: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $5,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won World Series with Seattle in 2022...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Boston on 7/18/2024...
10/28/2024: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $3,200,000 per year, for 2 years.
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 6/29/2025...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/7/2027 to a 3-year deal worth $4,804,444 per year...
